categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: The ship used by the Lurmen refugees was referred to as an "ol' boat".

The antiquated vesel was built prior to 52 BBY. It transported the Lurmen from their homeworld to Maridun. The Maridun Lurmen colony|group, led by Tee Watt Kaa, were forced to settle on the planet after the ship was disabled by Amani warriors. The Amani both prized and hated the alien object, and instead of fighting for it, the Lurmen departed in an escape pod, leaving the ship behind for the taking.
